channel.title: Games crashed mid game
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was in jail chatting with prince and game froze/crashed.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? NA
#### Steps to reproduce: Relaunched game, verified files via steam, Game is working fine.
#### Comments: First time the game has crashed on me. I tried uploading screenshot but the file is too big. The error message said to report folder named "2018-05-19_221520."
